channel.title: GOD command
channel.description:
Hi I am running a 317 rs server and i have been looking for how to add a god command or a command to make admins fly. But i cant find this anywhere, would somebody be kind enough to share the command with me please?
Thanks

item.title: GOD command
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

[quote=“Owner Saurus, post:10, topic:295636”]Here is the command =D

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“god”) && playerRights >= 2) {
setAnimation(1500);
playerSE = 1501;
playerSEW = 1851;
playerSER = 1851;
playerSEA = 1851;
playerEnergy = 99999999;
playerLevel[3] = 99999999;
sendFrame126(playerEnergy + “%”, 149);
sendMessage(“God mode on”);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“godoff”) && playerRights >= 2) {
sendMessage(“god mode off”);
playerSE = 0x328;
playerSEW = 0x333;
playerSER = 0x338;
playerSEA = 0x326;
playerEnergy = 100;
playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
sendFrame126(playerEnergy + “%”, 149);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}[/quote]

It was already given 2 times, dammit. Lock please.

And john, I doubt you actually wrote that yourself.

Read full topic

item.title: GOD command
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Saurus Owner Saurus
item.description:
@Owner_Saurus wrote:

Here is the command =D

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“god”) && playerRights >= 2) {
setAnimation(1500);
playerSE = 1501;
playerSEW = 1851;
playerSER = 1851;
playerSEA = 1851;
playerEnergy = 99999999;
playerLevel[3] = 99999999;
sendFrame126(playerEnergy + “%”, 149);
sendMessage(“God mode on”);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“godoff”) && playerRights >= 2) {
sendMessage(“god mode off”);
playerSE = 0x328;
playerSEW = 0x333;
playerSER = 0x338;
playerSEA = 0x326;
playerEnergy = 100;
playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
sendFrame126(playerEnergy + “%”, 149);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

Read full topic

item.title: GOD command
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

Alright i’ll explain.

setAnimation(1500); playerSE = 1501; playerSEW = 1851; playerSER = 1851; playerSEA = 1851;

That is the part of the code that sets the animation for your character to fly, and move while in air. It also allows you to change the way your char looks when he flies around.

sendFrame126(playerEnergy + "%", 149); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

The sendFrame126(playerEnergy + "%", 149); is what edits your run energy to 9999999%.
The updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; is what updates your character’s information and updates your appearance for you and other players to see.

Read full topic

item.description:
@busspuppy wrote:

and

item.title: GOD command
item.dc:creator: @Keegan1 Keegan_
item.description:
@Keegan1 wrote:

[quote=“John459, post:2, topic:295636”]Pretty simple command

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("god") && playerRights >= 2) { setAnimation(1500); playerSE = 1501; playerSEW = 1851; playerSER = 1851; playerSEA = 1851; playerEnergy = 99999999; playerLevel[3] = 99999999; sendFrame126(playerEnergy + "%", 149); sendMessage("God mode on"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("godoff") && playerRights >= 2) { sendMessage("god mode off"); playerSE = 0x328; playerSEW = 0x333; playerSER = 0x338; playerSEA = 0x326; playerEnergy = 100; playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); sendFrame126(playerEnergy + "%", 149); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }[/quote]

Only a simple command because you took it out of a server’s command, all you did was copy and paste, I don’t think you could write that out…

Read full topic
